Name: CT022 - pdf for the Report the purchase of a property in Portsmouth
Output_template:
{"name":"{reference}","remove_margins":"","setPaperType":"a4","content":" {#PDF_Top_Logo}
 
 
 

Report the purchase of a property in Portsmouth ({case_ref})

Your details and your current address

{#yourDetails/SF_Sum}

Address you are purchasing

{#newAddress/SF_Sum}
What is the completion date of purchase {completion}

Previous owner details

Do you have the contact details for the previous owner of your new address? {owner}
@af:if({owner} = 'yes')
{#previousOwner/SF_Sum}
@endaf:if

Property details

Is the property unoccupied? {unoccupied}
@af:if({unoccupied} = 'yes')
Is the property unfurnished? {unfurnished}
@endaf:if
@af:if({unoccupied} = 'no')
How many tenants have occupied? {tenants}
Do the tenants hold a joint tenancy? {joint}
Please provide the start date of the tenancy {startDate}
Please provide the date the tenants occupied {occupiedDate}
@endaf:if
@af:if({tenants} > '0')

Names of tenants

@af:repeat({nameTenants})
Title {nameTenants/Title_out}
First name {nameTenants/name}
Surname {nameTenants/surname}
@endaf:repeat
@endaf:if
@af:if({unfurnished} = 'yes')
Will the property be undergoing major structural repairs/renovations to make it habitable? {renovations}
@endaf:if
@af:if({renovations} = 'yes')
What works will be carried out? {#whatWorks}
@endaf:if
Please add any other information you feel may be useful in the box below {#otherInfo}

Payment details

Would you like to pay your Council Tax by Direct Debit? {payDD}
Are you completing this form on a mobile device? {on_mobile}
@af:if({payDD} = 'yes')

Direct Debit Setup

Instructions to your Bank or Building Society to pay by Direct Debit

A Direct Debit requires up to 10 days' notice. If there are fewer than 10 days until the next payment, the next payment may not be until the subsequent date and therefore instalments may be larger.

Bank details

{#bankDetails/SF_Sum}
Are you athorised to arrange Direct Debit payments from this account? {authorised}
Are multiple signatures required to setup a Direct Debit on your account? {signatures}
How often do you want to pay? {howOften}
@endaf:if
"}
